text: Juan Benito Ostoic Ostoic (21 March 1931 - 25 June 2020), known as Juan Ostoic, was a Chilean basketball player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1952 Summer Olympics and the 1956 Summer Olympics. Ostoic also created crossword puzzles for the La Tercera newspaper since 1981 under the pseudonym "Jota O". Ostoic was born in Huara, Chile. He died on 25 June 2020 from heart failure in Santiago de Chile, aged 89. ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Crossword makers Category:Olympians for Chile Category:Basketball players
title: Juan Ostoic
